short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover historical events that happened on this day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "On This Day..." is a Chrome extension that offers users a delightful daily dose of history. Seamlessly integrating into your browsing experience, this extension provides a compelling reason to download and explore the past. Users can simply click on the extension icon to unveil historical events that transpired on the current date throughout the years. Elevate your browsing routine with this enriching extension, transforming each new tab into a gateway to historical wonders. Download now and unlock a unique way to connect with the past â€“ your daily rendezvous with history awaits!
